data.name: Monster Bullets
data.detailed_description:
A VARIETY OF BULLETS
In Monster Bullets each monster has a unique weakness. For example the classic silver bullet that slays werewolves, or the old myths that state fey creatures are weak to iron. In Monster Bullets there are 6 bullets that ensure you will be kept on your toes when fighting.

PROCEDURAL DUNGEONS
Navigate catacombs, forests, caves, and more in Monster Bullets; all locations being procedurally generated to ensure that each run is different from the last!

GET STRONGER
During the course of a run you will have the opportunity to select upgrades and weapons that will give you an edge against the variety of monsters you will encounter.

PLAY WITH FRIENDS
Although Monster Bullets is built and balanced with singleplayer in mind that doesn't mean it can't also be balanced for multiplayer! Enjoy coop game play with your friends and coordinate who will load which bullet for which monster!

data.short_description: Monster Bullets is a retro fast paced FPS with a twist. Each monster has a unique weakness. Quickly load the correct bullet for each monster and fire them off! Experiment with upgrades on each procedurally generated attempt and try to reach the end!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5, AMD Ryzen or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000

data.legal_notice: Music used in the Monster Bullets Trailer is by Bensound.com

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains cartoon violence and blood involving hand drawn monsters.
